column1: Welcome to the latest survey and directory of existing mammal collections in the Western Hemisphere of the World.  The file here represents a work in progress, and we welcome any and all comments, particularly those that can help the Systematic Collections Committee improve the accuracy of this list.  You will note two font colors in the Excel file: black and green.  The collections listed in green are those for which we have received no updated data regarding that collection during the current survey.  Thus the information presented here is that of the last time data was received (either in 1987 or 1997).  Please contact Bill Stanley (bstanley@fieldmuseum.org) with any comments.
